snippet: Unpredictable, shifting winds have made fighting an Arizona wildfire particularly hard and may have caught a team of firefighters by surprise.
abstract: Swelling army of firefighters aided by bulldozers, air tankers and helicopters struggle to subdue Arizona forest blaze that killed 19 elite firefighters and continues carving a destructive path through two mountainside communities whose residents were forced to flee.
lead_paragraph: Unpredictable, shifting winds have made fighting an Arizona wildfire particularly hard and may have caught a team of firefighters by surprise.

headline.main: As Arizona Fires Rage On, Inquiry Into Firefighters’ Death Focuses on Wind
headline.print_headline: As Arizona Fires Rage On, Inquiry Into Firefighters’ Death Focuses on Wind
